mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carpool_info ( cptype, mno, start_point, start_long, start_lat, end_point, end_long, end_lat, start_datetime, charge, seat_num, seat_opt, drive_opt, trunk_use, smoke_use req_msg, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{cptype}, #{mno}, #{startPoint}, #{startLong}, #{startLat}, #{endPoint}, #{endLong}, #{endLat}, #{startDateTime}, #{charge}, #{seatNum}, #{seatOpt}, #{driveOpt}, #{trunkUse}, #{smokeUse} #{reqMsg}, sysdate() )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM carpool_info
AND startPoint LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchStart}, '%')
AND endPoint LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchEnd}, '%')
AND startDateTime >= #{startDateTime}
ORDER BY startDateTime DESC

SELECT matchno, mat.mno AS mat_mno, match_date, charge, start_point, end_point, reg_date, payno FROM carpool_info cp RIGHT JOIN carpool_match mat ON cp.cpno = mat.cpno WHERE mat.mno = #{mno} AND mat.progress = 1

SELECT matchno, mat.mno AS mat_mno, match_date, charge, start_point, end_point, reg_date, payno FROM carpool_info cp RIGHT JOIN carpool_match mat ON cp.cpno = mat.cpno WHERE mat mat.payno = #{payno} AND mat.progress =1
